input.sentences: the bride of the wedding has her picture taken in front of a luxury car .
a wedding guest tries some dance moves before the event begins .
friends and family gather at their tables for the wedding reception
the arrangements provided for the wedding are absolutely stunning .
a wedding guest has taken a wide-shot photograph of the space the event was held in .
output.sentences: Her best friend, Petra, is her maid of honor.
The groom's family is from a foreign country, but they seem to be excited as well.
They have prepared beautiful flowers for decorations.
Everyone is so happy to see the newlyweds.
